channel.title: 667/711 Leveling Up
channel.description:
I have a issue i'm currently trying to fix anyways here's the problem...
If you drink a attack potion @ 80 attack, lets say your boosted attack level is
102/80
Then it thinks that you leveled up so it goes Congratulations on 102 Attack etc lol then i get a news thing saying "blahblahblah has just achieved 99 attack" lol anyways Where would i have to edit to fix this so boosted levels dont count towards your actual level so like 99/80 dont = 99 attack but it = 80 attack and i dont get that news shit lol anyways Anyhelp is gladly welcome
Will Repp+++
heres a pic...please help..
[IMG]http://i1199.photobucket.com/albums/aa480/134cb/LevelingUp.png[/img]

item.title: 667/711 Leveling Up
item.dc:creator: @horses2007 horses2007
item.description:
@horses2007 wrote:

hmm, have you tried to look in combatassistance.java? im not familiar with anything above 562 but maybe look for the attack and strength and compare if you get what im saying.

Read full topic
